description: Triangle a(n,k) (n >= 1, 1<=k<=n) giving coefficient of x^n in expansion of {Product_{j=1..inf} (1-x^j) - 1 }^k.
references: H. Gupta, On the coefficients of the powers of Dedekind's modular form, J. London Math. Soc., 39 (1964), 433-440.
mathematica: a[n_, k_] := SeriesCoefficient[(-1)^n*(Product[(1 - x^j), {j, 1, n}] - 1)^k, {x, 0, n}]; Table[a[n, k], {n, 1, 12}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Dec 05 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
